intro.headline: COVID-19: info on bins, waste and recycling
intro.description:
Our other work is on hold for the next few weeks while we focus on supporting the Council to spread the word out about bin collections, recycling and waste reduction.

For the latest on bin collections, [visit the Council's website](https://www.leeds.gov.uk/residents/bins-and-recycling) or follow the Council's Leeds Recycles accounts on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/leedsrecycles) and [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LeedsRecycles/). We'll be posting regular updates on our [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/zerowasteleeds/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zerowasteleeds) and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zerowasteleeds/) accounts.
